2144.subject: BUS
2144.descrlong: Students study the importance of innovation to business success.  Innovation is analyzed from three perspectives: products, processes, and organizations.  Students understand the intricacies of developing new products, processes, and organizations.  Students explore how information-based systems are used to address the challenges of adding value to organizations.  Principles of operations management are examined to improve strategies, processes, and decision making to meet customer needs.
